author: alex
msg: Bugfix: "tomcat stop" or "shutdown" now works even if PoolTcpConnection is bound to another IP interface (other than localhost)

author: alex
msg: Could not connect to Tomcat. It's probably already stopped.
Another service is using the requested port (possibly another instance of Tomcat). Please stop the other service and try again.
Tomcat started. Check {0} for error and log messages.
...and a little better exception handling to ice the cake.

author: alex
msg: Trivial logger that sends all messages to the default sink.

msg: A simple interface for objects that own a Logger.Helper.
